title: Patch Notes
content: iption. Fixed a bug causing the UI to lock up when rapidly switching between keyboard and mouse input and controller input. Fixed a bug where opening the Main Menu on controller wouldn't automatically select the 'Resume' option at the top of the menu. Fixed a bug where you'd have to deselect your current passive when respeccing a character before selecting a new one. Now, you can just click the new one.
